thread.title: Dollar Tree, Inc. to Host First Quarter Earnings Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Dollar Tree, Inc. to Host First Quarter Earnings Conference Call
text:
CHESAPEAKE, Va.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Dollar Tree, Inc. (NASDAQ: DLTR), North America's leading operator of discount variety stores, will host its conference call for investors and analysts to discuss financial results for the first quarter ended May 5, 2018.
WHEN: Thursday, May 31, 2018 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time PARTICIPATE: At least 5 minutes prior to the conference call, please dial 877-260-4179 for USA and Canadian calls or 334-323-0522 for international calls. WEBCAST: Available on the investor relations section of the Company's website at www.dollartreeinfo.com/investors/news/events .
REPLAY: A recorded version of the call will be available until midnight Wednesday, June 6, and may be accessed by dialing 888-203-1112. Please enter Passcode # 6703228.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180517005123/en/
Dollar Tree, Inc., Chesapeake
Randy Guiler
757-321-5284
www.DollarTree.com
DLTR-E
Source: Dollar Tree, Inc.
